text: I really, really liked this game. It's a travesty that Mistwalker only release Mobile games now, probably due to lack of budget. I wish a big company would publish their games. The fact that a composing legend like Uematsu has also been so much under the radar for the past years also makes no sense.

yea seriously... so much for Sakaguchi and so much for Mistwalker.
they are now just a mere shadow of their former self. 

RIP. Now just mobile trash..

text: I jumped the gun when I saw this in my subs thinking it was some announcement for a sequel.  I'm not going to stop waiting, this is by far one of the greatest and everlasting games I've ever played. Finished it again recently and still felt all the feels I felt 10 years ago.

I mean its rival Last Remnant came on PC, so what gives?  Exclusivity rights had to have expired by now.

text: Selling my Xbox 360 tomorrow along with games, including Lost Odyssey. LO was one of the small handful of games that kept me from doing this, but I finally broke down and went for it while I'll still get over $100. PLEASE PLEASE PC VERSION. Or at least better emulation :P.

author: Louis Claudel

text: Goddamn incredible soundtrack by Uematsu, one of my faves from him. The game itself is pretty darn good too.
author: Shad G

text: Been meaning to play this game for a while. I've heard it's phenomenal.
author: LobesterAL

text: It's incredibly good. The turn-based combat is really cool and fluid. The characters are very touching and the text sequences are absolutely phenomenal. Also, that's more like a trivia but the french dub (yes there is a french dub ^^) is actually excellent. And it's freaking rare since french voice actors suck most of the time, but for Lost Odyssey's french version they hired the most known and talented voice actors and the result is really cool
author: Louis Claudel

text: LobesterAL its absolutely amazing. the spell casting can get a little old after awhile but the storyline....man, its so good.
author: DAWells1983

text: Personnaly i love the spell casting system. Classic and works wonder. It's also visually beautiful.
author: Louis Claudel

text: Oh just one thing : The framerate of the game is really awful x) Expect a constant 20-25 fps with even worse fps-drops.... But really that would be the only downside of the whole game
author: Louis Claudel

text: This game was practically another entry in the final fantasy series. I have fond memories of it. If you're cool with turn based, find a way to play it (both it and Blue Dragon have been part of the Xbox One backwards compatibility thingy for a little while now).
